summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1755, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue Northeast and Hillman Place, each from East Green Lake Boulevard to East Sixty-fifth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks and wooden cross walks, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, under Ordinance No. 18654, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
